allow:
Bash(echo "Run this command in your terminal:

gcloud auth login

This will open a browser. Login with your Google account.
After login, come back here.")
Bash(# Kill any running bot pkill -f ""main.py"" # Start the bot with V4 source venv/bin/activate && nohup python main.py 2>&1 & sleep 3 echo ""Bot started. Checking..."" ps aux)
Bash(launchctl stop com.podcastclipper.bot launchctl unload ~/Library/LaunchAgents/com.podcastclipper.bot.plist sleep 2 ps aux)
Bash(# Reload the launchd service with updated code launchctl load ~/Library/LaunchAgents/com.podcastclipper.bot.plist sleep 3 launchctl list)

Bash(# Stop launchd service launchctl unload ~/Library/LaunchAgents/com.podcastclipper.bot.plist # Kill ALL python processes for this project pkill -9 -f ""podcast_writer"" pkill -9 -f ""main.py"" # Wait for Telegram to release the connection echo ""Waiting 10s for Telegram to release connection..."" sleep 10 # Verify clean ps aux)
Bash(# Kill ALL Python processes related to this project pkill -9 -f ""podcast_writer"" pkill -9 -f ""main.py"" sleep 3 # Verify nothing is running ps aux)
Bash(# Kill ALL Python processes pkill -9 -f python sleep 3 # Verify all killed ps aux)
Bash(# First, kill EVERYTHING and check pkill -9 -f python sleep 3 ps aux)
